Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view

Class AdvancedCardInputHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.AdvancedCardInputHandler
public class AdvancedCardInputHandler extends Object
Class to handle user input on the CLI for advanced cards.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdvancedCardInputHandler

      public AdvancedCardInputHandler(AdvancedCharacterType characterToHandle, GameViewCLI cli)
      Parameters:
      characterToHandle - the character card of which to handle the parameters to play it.
      cli - the command line interface which is handling the player I/O.

  • Method Details

    • getCardInputs

      public Object[] getCardInputs()
      Based on the card which has to be played, calls the corresponding method to handle the user input correctly.
      Returns:
      corresponding advanced character requested parameters inserted by the user.
